text: Affirmative Repositioning Movement (AR) is a radical youth political movement in Namibia which advocates for Namibians to own urban land.Affirmative Repositioning: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly - The Namibian| Affirmative Repositioning vows to drag Namibian government to court - The NamibianSwapo vs Affirmative Repositioning Movement | Namib Times It was formed in 2014 as young Namibians held mass protests to demand land, it now participates in Namibian land reform.| Reposition Affirmative Repositioning into republican reasoning - The Namibian == References == Category:2015 establishments in Africa Category:Windhoek
title: Affirmative Repositioning
